content: Very nice! One thing that is missing and will be missing for a while is the constant feedback from an actual teacher on hand positioning, proper posture, proper breathing and more of the physical aspects of playing guitar that I wished that I learned or someone helped me on when I was young. Some of the bad habits I had developed early on is now a hindrance for me that I’m still trying to overcome. Good luck on your endeavor … both technologically and musically.
